a1: We generate Code 128 (subset B) barcodes, which is one of the most common and versatile barcode formats.
q2: Can I scan the generated barcodes?
a2: Yes, the generated barcodes are standard Code 128 and can be scanned by any barcode reader.
a3: Code 128B supports all standard ASCII characters including letters, numbers, and common symbols.
q4: Can I customize the barcode size?
a4: Yes, you can adjust the bar width (1-5 pixels per module) and the barcode height (30-300 pixels).
